Class ChanceCardMove

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt2003.model.chanceCards.ChanceCardMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChanceCard
public class ChanceCardMove extends Object implements ChanceCard
ChanceCardMove is a class that represents a chance card that moves the player to a new position. It implements the ChanceCard interface.
